alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 12:32PM MST until December 15 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Western Magic Valley and Southern Twin Falls County zones. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 10 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roads will become snow covered this evening and remain covered through the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley
